comments.body:
Used `object` due to attributes being set as a value of elements of `Builder._fields` which is just an object.

https://github.com/olivernn/lunr.js/blob/master/lunr.js#L2423
```javascript
this._fields[fieldName] = attributes || {}
```
https://github.com/olivernn/lunr.js/blob/master/lunr.js#L2360
```javascript
lunr.Builder = function () {
  this._ref = "id"
  this._fields = Object.create(null)
  this._documents = Object.create(null)
```

Used `object` due to attributes being set as a value of elements of `Builder._documents` which is just an object.

https://github.com/olivernn/lunr.js/blob/master/lunr.js#L2477
```javascript
this._documents[docRef] = attributes || {}
```
https://github.com/olivernn/lunr.js/blob/master/lunr.js#L2360
```javascript
lunr.Builder = function () {
  this._ref = "id"
  this._fields = Object.create(null)
  this._documents = Object.create(null)
```

The modified functions were introduced in 2.3.0 with this commit:

https://github.com/olivernn/lunr.js/commit/95d585298524cce52ab29c96f74ee8961d2ea9b8#diff-0fb61214341893489a1490be5f5b65a7
